info.title: Computer Vision API
info.description: Extract rich information from images to categorize and process visual dataâ€”and protect your users from unwanted content with this Azure Cognitive Service.

get.description: Return the schema for the request body format desired.

post.description: Recognize celebrities or landmarks in an image.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Supported domain-specific model to recognize in image.

post.description: Generates a list of words, or tags, that are relevant to the content of the supplied image.
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) detects text in an image and extracts the recognized characters into a machine-usable JSON stream.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code of the text to be detected in the image.

parameters.name: detectOrientation
parameters.description: he BCP-47 language code of the text to be detected in the image.

post.description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) detects text in an image and extracts the recognized characters into a text file.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code of the text to be detected in the image.

parameters.name: detectOrientation
parameters.description: The BCP-47 language code of the text to be detected in the image.

post.description: This operation extracts a rich set of visual features based on the image content.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The service will return recognition results in specified language.

parameters.name: visualFeatures
parameters.description: A string indicating what visual feature types to return. Multiple values should be comma-separated.

post.description: This operation generates a thumbnail image with the user-specified width and height.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the generated thumbnail - recommended is 50

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the generated thumbnail - recommended is 50

parameters.name: smartCropping
parameters.description: Boolean flag for enabling smart cropping

post.description: This operation generates a description of an image in human readable language with complete sentences.

parameters.name: maxCandidates
parameters.description: Maximum number of candidate descriptions to be returned.

post.description: This operation generates a description of image content in human readable language with complete sentences.

parameters.name: maxCandidates
parameters.description: Maximum number of candidate descriptions to be returned.

parameters.name: Image
parameters.description: Source of the image reference in body.

post.description: This operation generates a description of an image URL in human readable language with complete sentences.

parameters.name: maxCandidates
parameters.description: Maximum number of candidate descriptions to be returned.

parameters.name: ImageURL
parameters.description: Source of the image reference by URL

tags.description: Set of tags returned from the picture analysis.

confidence.description: Confidence score of the identified tag.

objects.description: Set of objects returned from the picture analysis.

confidence.description: Confidence score of the identified object.

language.description: Detected language of the image text.

text.description: Text detected in the image analyzed

name.description: Name of the category identified from the image

score.description: Confidence Score for the image category

description.description: Properties to describe the image analyzed

captions.description: List of captions generated from the image

confidence.description: Confidence score of the image caption

text.description: Text caption generated from the image
